column4: i have a little problem.. my a key is not working, and xev does not throw an "KeyPress" event but just "FocusIn"/"FocusOut".. so i guess it does not even send a proper keycode..
i can only type a little 'a' when i activate capslock and press shift+a
that's because pressing Shift+A when you have the caps lock on makes it go little.  If you don't press Shift+A and just the 'a' key then it will come up capital as long as you have Caps Lock on
